quests.desc: Get ready to pick stuff up and put it in places, because you've just entered TextWorld! Here is how to play! First of all, recover the key from the suitcase. After that, doublecheck that the hatch is unlocked. If you have unlocked the hatch, ensure that the hatch inside the pantry is open. Then, make an effort to head south. And then, ensure that the gateway is open. After you have opened the gateway, go to the west. And then, pick up the staple from the shelf in the studio. Then, make an effort to move east. Then, attempt to venture north. After that, insert the staple inside the safe in the pantry. And once you've done that, you win!

infos.name: pantry
infos.desc:
Well, here we are in a pantry. The room seems oddly familiar, as though it were only superficially different from the other rooms in the building.

 You can make out a safe. Now that's what I call TextWorld![if c_0 is open and there is something in the c_0] The safe contains [a list of things in the c_0].[end if][if c_0 is open and the c_0 contains nothing] Empty! What kind of nightmare TextWorld is this?[end if] You can see [if c_1 is locked]a locked[else if c_1 is open]an opened[otherwise]a closed[end if] suitcase.[if c_1 is open and there is something in the c_1] The suitcase contains [a list of things in the c_1]. There's something strange about this being here, but you can't put your finger on it.[end if][if c_1 is open and the c_1 contains nothing] What a letdown! The suitcase is empty![end if]

 There is [if d_1 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] portal leading east. There is [if d_11 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] hatch leading south. You don't like doors? Why not try going west, that entranceway is unguarded.

infos.name: kitchenette
infos.desc:
You find yourself in a kitchenette. A typical kind of place.

 You see a TextWorld style chest.[if c_2 is open and there is something in the c_2] The TextWorld style chest contains [a list of things in the c_2].[end if][if c_2 is open and the c_2 contains nothing] Empty! What kind of nightmare TextWorld is this?[end if] Oh, great. Here's a bowl. [if there is something on the s_1]You see [a list of things on the s_1] on the bowl. You idly wonder how they came up with the name TextWorld for this place. It's pretty fitting.[end if][if there is nothing on the s_1]But the thing hasn't got anything on it. It would have been so cool if there was stuff on the bowl.[end if]

You need an unguarded exit? You should try going east.

infos.name: basement
infos.desc:
You're now in a basement.



 There is [if d_11 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] hatch leading north. There is [if d_2 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] passageway leading south. There is [if d_10 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] gateway leading west.

infos.name: studio
infos.desc:
You are in a studio. A typical one. You begin to take stock of what's in the room.

 You can see a Henderson's limited edition box.[if c_3 is open and there is something in the c_3] The Henderson's limited edition box contains [a list of things in the c_3].[end if][if c_3 is open and the c_3 contains nothing] The Henderson's limited edition box is empty! This is the worst thing that could possibly happen, ever![end if] You make out a shelf. Wow, isn't TextWorld just the best? [if there is something on the s_0]You see [a list of things on the s_0] on the shelf.[end if][if there is nothing on the s_0]The shelf appears to be empty. Hm. Oh well[end if]

 There is [if d_10 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] gateway leading east. There is [if d_9 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] gate leading west.

infos.name: cookhouse
infos.desc:
You arrive in a cookhouse. A normal kind of place. You decide to start listing off everything you see in the room, as if you were in a text adventure.



 There is [if d_9 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] gate leading east. There is [if d_8 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] door leading south.

infos.name: cubicle
infos.desc:
You are in a cubicle.



 There is [if d_8 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] door leading north. There is [if d_7 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] wooden portal leading west.

infos.name: study
infos.desc:
You have walked into the most standard of all possible studys.



 There is [if d_7 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] wooden portal leading east. There is [if d_6 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] walnut passageway leading north.

infos.name: workshop
infos.desc:
This is going to sound unbelievable, but you've just entered a workshop.

 You can see [if c_4 is locked]a locked[else if c_4 is open]an opened[otherwise]a closed[end if] ordinary looking box right there by you.[if c_4 is open and there is something in the c_4] The box contains [a list of things in the c_4].[end if][if c_4 is open and the c_4 contains nothing] The box is empty, what a horrible day![end if]

 There is [if d_3 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] stone hatch leading west. There is an exit to the south. Don't worry, it is unblocked.

infos.name: attic
infos.desc:
You've just shown up in an attic.



 There is [if d_3 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] stone hatch leading east. There is [if d_4 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] walnut gateway leading south. There is an unguarded exit to the north.

infos.name: office
infos.desc:
You find yourself in an office. An ordinary one. You start to take note of what's in the room.

 You see [if c_5 is locked]a locked[else if c_5 is open]an opened[otherwise]a closed[end if] chest in the corner.[if c_5 is open and there is something in the c_5] The chest contains [a list of things in the c_5]. Hmm. You always thought you'd be more excited to see a chest in a room.[end if][if c_5 is open and the c_5 contains nothing] The chest is empty! This is the worst thing that could possibly happen, ever![end if]

 There is [if d_2 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] passageway leading north. There is an exit to the east. Don't worry, it is unblocked. There is an exit to the west. Don't worry, it is unblocked.

infos.name: serious workshop
infos.desc:
Ah, the workshop. This is some kind of workshop, really great serious vibes in this place, a wonderful serious atmosphere. The room is well lit.

 You rest your hand against a wall, but you miss the wall and fall onto a chair. [if there is something on the s_2]You see [a list of things on the s_2] on the chair. There's something strange about this being here, but you can't put your finger on it.[end if][if there is nothing on the s_2]But the thing hasn't got anything on it.[end if]

You need an unguarded exit? You should try going east.

infos.name: silent cubicle
infos.desc:
You are in a cubicle. A silent one.

 You hear a noise behind you and spin around, but you can't see anything other than a American safe.[if c_6 is open and there is something in the c_6] The American safe contains [a list of things in the c_6].[end if][if c_6 is open and the c_6 contains nothing] The American safe is empty! What a waste of a day![end if]

There is an unguarded exit to the north. There is an unguarded exit to the west.

infos.name: chamber
infos.desc:
You've just sauntered into a chamber.



 There is [if d_0 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] wooden door leading north. There is [if d_1 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] portal leading west. You don't like doors? Why not try going south, that entranceway is unblocked.

infos.name: cookery
infos.desc:
You arrive in a cookery. A standard kind of place.



 There is [if d_0 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] wooden door leading south. There is an unguarded exit to the west.

infos.name: bedchamber
infos.desc:
You are in a bedchamber. An usual kind of place.



You need an unblocked exit? You should try going east.

infos.name: bedroom
infos.desc:
You arrive in a bedroom. A standard kind of place.

 You make out a dresser. There's something strange about this being here, but you can't put your finger on it.[if c_7 is open and there is something in the c_7] The dresser contains [a list of things in the c_7].[end if][if c_7 is open and the c_7 contains nothing] Empty! What kind of nightmare TextWorld is this?[end if]

 There is [if d_5 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] beech door leading north. There is [if d_6 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] walnut passageway leading south.

infos.name: bar
infos.desc:
I am stoked to announce that you are now in the bar.

 You scan the room, seeing a coffer. I mean, just wow! Isn't TextWorld just the best?[if c_8 is open and there is something in the c_8] The coffer contains [a list of things in the c_8].[end if][if c_8 is open and the c_8 contains nothing] The coffer is empty, what a horrible day![end if]

There is an unguarded exit to the south.

infos.name: laundry place
infos.desc:
You are in a laundry place. A normal one.

 You make out a type Z locker.[if c_10 is open and there is something in the c_10] The type Z locker contains [a list of things in the c_10].[end if][if c_10 is open and the c_10 contains nothing] The type Z locker is empty! This is the worst thing that could possibly happen, ever![end if] You can make out [if c_9 is locked]a locked[else if c_9 is open]an opened[otherwise]a closed[end if] basket.[if c_9 is open and there is something in the c_9] The basket contains [a list of things in the c_9]![end if][if c_9 is open and the c_9 contains nothing] The basket is empty! What a waste of a day![end if]

There is an exit to the north. Don't worry, it is unblocked.

infos.name: laundromat
infos.desc:
Ah, the laundromat. This is some kind of laundromat, really great standard vibes in this place, a wonderful standard atmosphere. And now, well, you're in it. You begin looking for stuff.

 You can see a drawer.[if c_11 is open and there is something in the c_11] The drawer contains [a list of things in the c_11].[end if][if c_11 is open and the c_11 contains nothing] The drawer is empty! This is the worst thing that could possibly happen, ever![end if]

There is an exit to the north. Don't worry, it is unblocked. You don't like doors? Why not try going south, that entranceway is unblocked.

infos.name: spare room
infos.desc:
Guess what, you are in the place we're calling the spare room. You begin to take stock of what's here.

 Hey, want to see a workbench? Look over there, a workbench. [if there is something on the s_3]On the workbench you make out [a list of things on the s_3].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_3]But the thing hasn't got anything on it. You move on, clearly done caring about TextWorld.[end if] You can see a stand! [if there is something on the s_4]On the stand you can make out [a list of things on the s_4].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_4]Unfortunately, there isn't a thing on it. Sometimes, just sometimes, TextWorld can just be the worst.[end if]

 There is [if d_4 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] walnut gateway leading north. There is [if d_5 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] beech door leading south.

objective: It's time to explore the amazing world of TextWorld! First of all, recover the key from the suitcase. After that, unlock the hatch inside the pantry. And then, ensure that the hatch in the pantry is open. After that, make an attempt to go to the south. With that done, open the gateway in the basement. Then, go to the west. If you can accomplish that, recover the staple from the shelf. After that, make an attempt to venture east. And then, attempt to go north. And then, put the staple into the safe inside the pantry. Alright, thanks!
